Package ispd.gui.drawing.icon

Interface Icon

All Known Implementing Classes:
Cluster, Edge, EdgeGridItem, Internet, Link, Machine, Vertex, VertexGridItem
public interface Icon

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    contains (int x, int y)
    Returns true if this icon is contained in an area near the given X and Y coordinates.
    void
    draw (Graphics g)
    It draws this icon.
    Image
    getImage()
    Returns the icon image; that is, the image that is going to be representing this icon.
    Integer
    getX()
    Returns the icon x-coordinate in cartesian coordinates.
    Integer
    getY()
    Returns the icon y-coordinate in cartesian coordinates.
    boolean
    isSelected()
    Returns true if this icon has been selected.
    void
    setSelected (boolean selected)
    It sets this as selected or not.

  • Method Details

    • draw

      void draw (Graphics g)
      It draws this icon.
      Parameters:
      g - the Graphics which will draw this icon

    • contains

      boolean contains (int x, int y)
      Returns true if this icon is contained in an area near the given X and Y coordinates. Otherwise, false is returned.
      Parameters:
      x - the X-coordinate
      y - the Y-coordinate
      Returns:
      true if this icon is near the given X and Y coordinates; otherwise, returns false.

    • isSelected

      boolean isSelected()
      Returns true if this icon has been selected. Otherwise false is returned.
      Returns:
      true if this icon has been selected; otherwise, false is returned.

    • setSelected

      void setSelected (boolean selected)
      It sets this as selected or not.
      Parameters:
      selected - if true, set this icon as selected; otherwise, set this icon as not selected.

    • getX

      Integer getX()
      Returns the icon x-coordinate in cartesian coordinates.
      Returns:
      the icon x-coordinate in cartesian coordinates

    • getY

      Integer getY()
      Returns the icon y-coordinate in cartesian coordinates.
      Returns:
      the icon y-coordinate in cartesian coordinates

    • getImage

      Image getImage()
      Returns the icon image; that is, the image that is going to be representing this icon.
      Returns:
      this icon image
